clause: Skip to content Why DataRobot Apps & Agents Platform Resources About Applicant Privacy Policy Last Updated: May 18, 2023 The purpose of this Applicant Privacy Policy (“Policy”) is to provide you with information about how DataRobot, Inc.
label: none

clause: (the “Company,” “DataRobot,” “we,” “us” and/or “our”) processes your personal data collected during the recruitment process.
label: none

clause: This Policy describes the categories of personal information collected by the Company and the purposes for which such information may be collected and used.
label: none

clause: This Policy applies to any individuals who submit an application for an advertised position, provide their personal data for general employment inquiries, or otherwise seek to work for DataRobot, regardless of the manner in which you provide your personal data.
label: none

clause: This Policy applies in addition to our general Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: Please refer to the Privacy Policy for our practices related to personal data submitted for other purposes.
label: none

clause: This Policy may be updated from time to time.
label: none

clause: For additional information about the Company’s data privacy practices, please review our Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: Categories of Personal Information Collected During the recruitment process, we may need to collect certain data about you, either from you directly, or from third parties with your approval.
label: none

clause: This data may include the following: Identifiers and Contact information.
label: none

clause: This category includes names, addresses, telephone numbers, mobile numbers, email addresses, signatures, account names, dates of birth, bank account information, and other similar contact information and identifiers.
label: none

clause: This category includes characteristics of protected classifications under California or federal law.
label: none

clause: Internet or Other Electronic Network Activity Information.
label: none

clause: This category includes, without limitation: all activity on the Company’s information systems, such as internet browsing history, search history, intranet activity, email communications, social media postings, stored documents and emails, usernames and passwords all activity on communications systems, including phone calls, call logs, voice mails, text messages, chat logs, app use, mobile browsing and search history, mobile email communications, and other information regarding an employee’s use of company-issued devices.
label: none

clause: This category includes, without limitation, GPS location data from company-owned or issued mobile devices, applications, or vehicles.
label: location

clause: Audio, Electronic, Visual, Thermal, Olfactory, or Similar Information.
label: none

clause: This category includes, for example, information collected from cameras, thermometers, and similar devices.
label: none

clause: This category includes the use of biometric equipment, devices, or software to record your time worked, to enter or exit facilities or rooms, to access or use equipment, or for other business purposes.
label: none

clause: Professional and Employment-Related Information.
label: none

clause: This category includes, without limitation: data submitted with employment applications, including salary history, employment history, employment recommendations, etc.
label: none

clause: background check and criminal history work authorization performance and disciplinary records salary and bonus data benefit plan enrollment, participation, and claims information leave of absence information, including religious and family obligations, and physical and mental health data, concerning employees and their family members Education Information.
label: employment_checks

clause: This category includes, without limitation, education history.
label: none

clause: This category includes sensitive information such as: social security, driver’s license, state identification card, or passport number financial account information that allows access to an account, including log-in credentials, financial account numbers, passwords, etc.
label: none

clause: precise geolocation racial or ethnic origin, content of mail, email, and text messages (unless the Company is the intended recipient of the communication) and health information.
label: none

clause: Purposes Personal Information, Including Sensitive Personal Information, Is Used Data we collect about you as part of our recruitment process may be used for the following purposes: Collecting and processing employment applications, including confirming eligibility for employment, background and related checks, onboarding, and related recruiting efforts.
label: none

clause: Processing payroll, other forms of compensation, and employee benefit plan and program design and administration including enrollment and claims handling, and leave of absence administration.
label: none

clause: Maintaining physician records and occupational health programs.
label: none

clause: Maintaining personnel records and record retention requirements.
label: none

clause: Communicating with employees and/or employees’ emergency contacts and plan beneficiaries.
label: none

clause: Complying with applicable state and federal health, labor, employment, benefits, workers compensation, disability, equal employment opportunity, workplace safety, and related laws, guidance, or recommendations.
label: none

clause: Preventing unauthorized access to, use, or disclosure/removal of the Company’s property, including the Company’s information systems, electronic devices, network, and data.
label: none

clause: Ensuring and enhancing employee productivity and adherence to the Company’s policies.
label: none

clause: Providing training and development opportunities.
label: none

clause: Investigating complaints, grievances, and suspected violations of Company policy.
label: none

clause: Designing, implementing, and promoting the Company’s diversity and inclusion programs.
label: none

clause: Facilitating the efficient and secure use of the Company’s information systems.
label: none

clause: Ensuring compliance with the Company information systems policies and procedures.
label: none

clause: Improving safety of employees, customers and the public with regard to use of Company property and equipment.
label: none

clause: Improving efficiency, logistics, and supply chain management.
label: none

clause: Improving accuracy of time management systems and attendance, including vacation, sick leave, and other leave of absence monitoring.
label: none

clause: Evaluating an individual’s appropriateness for a particular position at the Company, or promotion to a new position.
label: none

clause: Managing customer engagement and other legitimate business purposes.
label: none

clause: Responding to and managing legal claims against the Company and/or its personnel, including civil discovery in litigation.
label: none

clause: Facilitating other business administrative functions and strategic activities, such as risk management, information technology and communications, financial management and reporting, workforce and succession planning, merger and acquisition activities, and maintenance of licenses, permits and authorization applicable to Company operations.
label: none

clause: If you accept a position with DataRobot, your data will become part of your employment records.
label: none

clause: At that point, your data will be subject to our applicable employee privacy policies.
label: none

clause: If you are not hired, or elect to withdraw or decline our employment offer, we will retain your applicant data for three years unless a longer period is required by applicable law or to establish, exercise, or defend legal challenges related to our recruitment processes.
label: none

clause: We hold your data for three years so that we may consider you for other positions that arise within our organization and to comply with our regulatory requirements.
label: none

clause: We retain your personal information for as long as is necessary to process your application for employment, process your payroll, administer your benefits, etc.
label: none

clause: and in accordance with the Company’s data retention schedule.
label: none

clause: We may retain your personal information for longer if it is necessary to comply with our legal or reporting obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, enforce our legal agreements and policies, address other legitimate business needs, or as permitted or required by applicable law.
label: none

clause: We may also retain your personal information in a deidentified or aggregated form so that it can no longer be associated with you.
label: none

clause: To determine the appropriate retention period for your personal information, we consider various factors such as the amount, nature, and sensitivity of your information; the potential risk of unauthorized access, use or disclosure; the purposes for which we collect or process your personal information; and applicable legal requirements.
label: none

clause: Personal information does not include certain categories of information, such as publicly available information from government records, and deidentified or aggregated consumer information.
label: none

clause: To carry out the purposes outlined above, the Company may disclose personal information to service providers or other third parties, such as background check vendors, third-party staffing vendors, information technology vendors, outside legal counsel, and state or federal governmental agencies.
label: data_sharing

clause: In addition to the parties listed in the Privacy Policy, we may share your personal data with your references and your previous or current employers to perform professional reference and employment checks.
label: none

clause: The Company does not sell or share, as those terms are defined under applicable law, the above categories of personal information.
label: none

clause: The Company may add to the categories of personal information it collects and the purposes for which it uses that information.
label: none

clause: California Resident Individual Rights Requests.
label: none

clause: Individuals who are residents of the State of California have certain individual rights, which are outlined below.
label: none

clause: Right To Know About Personal Information Collected or Disclosed.
label: none

clause: As a California resident, you have the right to request additional information, beyond that disclosed above, regarding the following, to the extent applicable: the categories of personal information the Company collected about you the categories of sources from which that personal information was collected the business or commercial purposes for which that information was collected, sold, or shared the categories of third parties to whom the information was disclosed the specific pieces of personal information collected Upon receipt of a verifiable request to know (see below), and as required by applicable law, we will provide a response to such request.
label: none

clause: Right To Request Deletion of Your Personal Information.
label: none

clause: You have the right to request that we delete the personal information we collected or maintain about you.
label: none

clause: Once we receive your request, we will let you know what, if any, personal information we can delete from our records, and will direct any service providers and contractors to whom we disclosed your personal information to also delete your personal information from their records.
label: none

clause: There may be circumstances where we cannot delete your personal information or direct service providers or contractors to delete your personal information from their records.
label: none

clause: Such instances include, without limitation, when the information at issue is maintained: (a) to enable solely internal uses that are reasonably aligned with your expectations based on your relationship with the Company and compatible with the context in which you provided the information, or (b) to comply with a legal obligation.
label: none

clause: Upon receipt of a verifiable request to delete (see below), and as required by applicable law, we will provide a response to such requests.
label: none

clause: You have the right to request that the Company correct any inaccurate personal information we maintain about you, taking into account the nature of that information and purpose for processing it.
label: none

clause: Upon receipt of a verifiable request to correct (see below), and as required by the CCPA, we will provide a response to such requests.
label: none

clause: Right to Limit Use or Disclosure of Sensitive Personal Information.
label: none

clause: You have the right, subject to certain exceptions, to request that we limit the use and disclosure of your sensitive personal information, as that term is defined in the CCPA.
label: none

clause: Upon receipt of a verifiable consumer request, and as required by the CCPA, we will take appropriate steps to respond to your request.
label: none

clause: Right to Non-Discrimination for the Exercise of Your Privacy Rights.
label: none

clause: We will not discriminate or retaliate against you for exercising any of the rights described above.
label: none

clause: To submit a CCPA Rights request as outlined above, please contact us at privacy@datarobot.com or submit a General Inquiry form on https://www.datarobot.com/contact-us/.
label: none

clause: We reserve the right to only respond to verifiable consumer requests that are submitted as instructed.
label: none

clause: We reserve the right to amend this notice at any time without advance notice.
label: none

clause: Please direct questions about this notice to privacy@datarobot.com.
label: none

clause: European Union, UK or European Economic Area Residents.
label: none

clause: If you are a resident of the European Union, UK or European Economic Area we may rely on one or more of the following lawful bases for processing your applicant data: Our legitimate interests, which are summarized above in the section titled “Purposes Personal Information, Including Sensitive Personal Information, Is Used”; To comply with applicable laws and regulations; To take steps to enter into an employment contract with you; and/or Where we have your consent to process your data.
label: none

clause: If you have knowledge that the Company collected personal information related to your spouse, dependent, or associate, please share a copy of this notice with all such individuals.
label: none
